Sentencas: A theoretical evaluation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is very important because internal ohmic resistances account for a large part of the losses occurring in SOFCs and significantly affect cell performance.
Titulo: Detailed simulation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However in the majority of cases, a detailed evaluation of ohmic losses is not an elementary task, since the structure of the geometry makes it difficult to apply simple laws, such as R=rho l/S. The solution of a PDE equation is required, which has to be performed numerically.
Titulo: Detailed simulation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper two different numerical approaches have been applied to the simulation of the internal ohmic resistances of basic SOFC units, and the results have been compared.
Titulo: Detailed simulation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In particular the commercial mathematical software FEMLAB and MATLAB have been used to implement the different numerical approaches.
Titulo: Detailed simulation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The agreement between the obtained results is very good.
Titulo: Detailed simulation of the ohmic resistance of solid oxide fuel cells
